title: Enrollment of postsecondary students in Canada , by age and gender 2017/18
summary: Overall Male, and Female are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Number of students, in descending order is: 1. Female, and lastly, 2. Male.
The greatest difference of Number of students between Male and Female occurs at Year Less_than_20_years and the smallest difference occurs at 40_years_and_over.
min_summary: Overall Male, and Female are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
mid_summary: Overall Male, and Female are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
max_summary: Overall Male, and Female are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The difference of Number of students between Male and Female is greater at Year Less_than_20_years compared to the Year 40_years_and_over.
